content.description: A section of a circuit contains an arrangement of six identical resistors, each of resistance <math alttext="R sub 0" overflow="scroll"> <msub> <mi>R</mi> <mn>0</mn> </msub> </math>. Three of the resistors are connected in parallel. The remaining three resistors are connected in series with the three-resistor parallel combination, as shown in the figure.
content.question: What is the equivalent resistance of the six-resistor combination?

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
